Sophomore guard Kameron McGusty dribbles around a defender March  PERIOD

Sophomore guard Kameron McGusty announced Monday morning he will transfer from the Sooners program PERIOD

NewBeginnings pic.twitter.comnOKfieqx1S

McGusty made eight starts this season coming off the bench in relief for juniors Christian James and Rashard Odomes PERIOD

He averaged . points and . rebounds in his twoseason career at Oklahoma PERIOD He was an AllBig  Honorable Mention and AllNewcomer selection as a rookie PERIOD

McGusty becomes the second player to announce his transfer after sophomore guard Jordan Shepherd tweeted Saturday that he also plans to leave PERIOD After the duos departure the Sooners will be down four players because freshman guard Trae Youngdeclared for the NBA Draft and senior forward Khadeem Lattin will soon graduate PERIOD
